title: Man United Found Their Stride?
description:
The FC crew look over Man United's consistent run of performances which sees them edging closer to the top four. Plus, Arsenal recover with a 5-0 trouncing of Nottingham Forest, Carlo Ancelotti gets upset over a debatable handball penalty and the panel break down Liverpool's current myriad of issues.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Man United hum along; Arsenal keep a rapid pace on PL; Liverpool need galvanizing; Ancelotti upset over penalty call
